metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24839 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: org.cyberneko.html is an html parser written in Java. The fork of`org.cyberneko.html` used by Nokogiri (Rubygem) raises a`java.lang.OutOfMemoryError` exception when parsing ill-formed HTML markup.Users are advised to upgrade to `>= 1.9.22.noko2`. Note: The upstreamlibrary `org.cyberneko.html` is no longer maintained. Nokogiri uses its ownfork of this library located at https://github.com/sparklemotion/nekohtmland this CVE applies only to that fork. Other forks of nekohtml may have asimilar vulnerability.

criterions.comment: nekohtml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
